ComicInfo.Title: Where Were You ...When the Lights Went Out?
ComicInfo.Summary: Where Were You ...When the Lights Went Out?: Spidey and the Black Widow try to gather evidence to free an ex-gang member who has been framed for murder. Spidey leaves for the Secret Wars.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:48:47. [Issue ID 38570]
